title: Republican Lawsuits Aim to Push In-Person Election Day Voting
description: The efforts, which are strong in battleground states, could create a false impression that Republicans are faring better on election night.
dc:creator: Nick Corasaniti
media:credit: Eva Marie Uzcategui for The New York Times
media:description: Official vote-by-mail balloting material at an early voting polling location in Coral Gables, Fla.
